DOC.criteria: Healthy female age 1840 ( inclusive ) BMI 26.535.4 kg/m² ( inclusive ) Regular menstrual cycle ( 28 ± 3 day ) Weight stable ( within ± 3kg ) 2 month prior study inclusion Must use barrier contraception ( e.g . male/female condom ) study 's duration Must willing follow prescribe diet/exercise plan study 's duration On hormonal contraceptive daily use medication make subject unsuitable inclusion study . Any significant health problem ( history cancer , HIV/AIDS , Diabetes , cardiovascular disease , untreated hypothyroidism , etc . ) Restrictions participate cardiovascular exercise strength training Any condition , opinion investigator make subject unsuitable inclusion study . Women pregnant , lactating , plan become pregnant study period
